author: taylor
msg: add eclipse class path - only added for graffito-portlets thus far

author: taylor
msg: - note this is not a portlet application, but a collection of portlets to be reused in other portlet applications
1. Tree Portlet - a tree view over a Graffito URI space rooted in a scope
2. Search Portlet - searches for documents using Graffito Search service
3. DocumentPortlet - displays a Graffito document, communicates with the Tree and Search portlet to receive

author: rgardler
msg: -allow FORREST_HOME to be set by another plugin (some plugins need a specific version of Forrest)\n-pass forrest.plugins property value to servlet startup -separated jetty server starting into a separate class (first phae of allowing support of different servlet engines)
